title: Miscellaneous Steel Estimator  Full-Time
job_overview:
WE’RE HIRING: Miscellaneous Steel Estimator
 Full-Time 

Are you highly skilled in steel fabrication estimating and ready to take your career to the next level? We are seeking a Miscellaneous Steel Estimator with a solid understanding of both structural and specialty steel to join our growing team.

You’ll be responsible for preparing precise takeoffs, managing drawing sets, building cost estimates, and coordinating with vendors and internal teams. This role demands accuracy, strong industry knowledge, and the ability to juggle multiple projects.

WHAT YOU’LL BE DOING:
Analyze blueprints, specifications, and proposals to determine labor, material, and time requirements.

Prepare detailed estimates for miscellaneous and structural steel, including stairs, railings, tanks, hoppers, chutes, and more.

Develop scopes of work, bid packages, and value-engineered solutions.

Manage drawing reviews and track submittals from internal review to fabrication release.

Collaborate with vendors and subcontractors to ensure competitive, complete pricing.

Maintain and refine internal estimating databases and tools.

Support business development efforts by preparing polished client proposals and identifying potential new projects.

WHAT WE’RE LOOKING FOR:
Minimum 5 years experience in miscellaneous steel fabrication estimating.

Proficient in Tekla EPM, Bluebeam/Adobe, and Microsoft Excel/Word.

Knowledge of AISC, AWS, NOMMA, AESS, and SSPC standards.

Strong organizational and communication skills.

Detail-oriented and able to manage multiple estimates under tight deadlines.

TO APPLY:
Please submit the following:

Resume

Brief Self-Introduction Video (1–2 minutes – tell us about your experience and what excites you about this role)

Samples of Previous Work (e.g., takeoffs, estimates, bid packages – remove or redact confidential information)
